title: Dashboard Panel
description: A dashboard panel of a bundle

name.description: The internal name of your panel.

title.description: The title displayed on the NodeCG workspace.

file.description: The relative path (from your bundle's root directory) to the HTML file to be served as a dashboard panel.

width.description: An optional property, the amount of space the bundle takes up on the page.

headerColor.description: An optional property, that will change the color of the panel's header to a provided hexadecimal color value.

workspace.description: An optional property, that when set will place the panel into a new workspace with the name provided. These workspaces can be shared between bundles.

fullbleed.description: An optional property, that when set to true will place the panel in it's own workplace at the maximum possible width and height with no margins.

dialog.description: An optional property, that will turn the panel into a dialog that other panels are able to open.

dialogButtons.description: An optional property, that will show buttons for confirm, dismiss, or both on the dialog.

name.description: The name of the dialog button.

type.description: The type of the dialog button.
